actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to rededicating the Nation to the principles expressed in the Declaration of Independence.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that specified provisions of the Declaration of Independence shall be added to the Preamble of the Constitution.

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect to rededicating the Nation to the principles expressed in the Declaration of Independence.
